specifications.Dye Method: Piece Dye - Yarn Effect > Worsted Yarn Worsted is a high-quality type of wool yarn, typically made from long-staple pasture wool. It is commonly used in the production of tailored garments, such as suits. In tropical-weight worsteds, tightly spun and straightened wool, combined with a looser weave, allows for better airflow through the fabric.
specifications.Care Instructions: Dry clean only Recommended Use Coats
